# Kali Linux 秘籍

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/kali-linux-miji
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/kali-linux-miji
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install kali-linux-miji
kali-linux-miji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g kali-linux-miji
kali-linux-miji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
